definition: Western Zhou (1027-771 BC)
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
week/weekly/variant of 周[zhou1]
Eastern Zhou (1046-771 BC) and Western Zhou (770-221 BC)

sentences.english: The development of China's dance got to the first peak in the Western Zhou Dynast.
sentences.chinese: 西周是中国舞蹈发展史上的第一个高峰。

sentences.english: During the Western Zhou period, ancestor worship may have been practiced only by members of the aristocracy.
sentences.chinese: 在西周时期，祖先崇拜可能只在贵族成员中盛行。

sentences.english: Before the Western Zhou Dynasty, the connection between Huaihe River valley and the Hanshui River basin were not significant.
sentences.chinese: 西周以前，淮河流域和汉水流域间缺乏密切联系。

sentences.english: The lotus culture formed in the period from West Zhou Dynasty to the Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 荷文化形成于西周至春秋战国时期。

sentences.english: The concept of "Rule of Virtue" was conceived in Xia and Shang Dynasties and was born in the early westernzhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 德治的理念孕育于夏商，诞生在西周初年。

sentences.english: Ningxia was home to the Rong and Di tribes in the Western Zhou dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 宁夏是西周时戎族和羝族的故乡。

sentences.english: Western Zhou Dynasty is the model of Chinese early country.
sentences.chinese: 西周时期，是中国早期国家的典型期。

sentences.english: Further, the author studies the chronology of the Jin marquese in the Western Zhou period from Marquise Jing.
sentences.chinese: 进一步，还可考证出晋靖侯以降西周时期晋侯系年。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the sewer of YanDu City in the Western Zhou Dynasty newly found in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 介绍在北京新发现的西周燕都城的下水道。

sentences.english: The planning system of imperial palace had been formed in the Western Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 宫城制度在西周时期已经形成形式上的定制。

sentences.english: Ying State was a feudal princedom in Central Plains in the Western Zhou period.
sentences.chinese: 应国是我国西周时期中原地区的一个小诸侯国。

sentences.english: It showed characters of the West Zhou Dynasty which was the most advanced Chinese Slavery Society.
sentences.chinese: 它揭示出西周王朝中国奴隶社会全盛时代的特点。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, such system was modified again.
sentences.chinese: 到了春秋时期，西周的宫城制度又发生了变化。

sentences.english: Duke Zhou was an outstanding ideologist and politician in the Western Zhou period.
sentences.chinese: 周公是西周初期杰出的思想家和政治家。

sentences.english: Through the textual research, it began in the West Zhou Dynasty for more than 2,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 据考证，距今已有二千多年的历史，它始于西周时代。

sentences.english: It was one of two important branches which built the building of the West Zhou Dynasty(the other important branch was dividing system).
sentences.chinese: 它是构筑西周王朝统治大厦的两根重要支柱之一。

definition: Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
final name of the Shang dynasty after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
Shang Dynasty (c. 1600-1046 BC)
the Zhou dynasty from 1027 BC
Zhou Dynasty/Western Zhou 西周 (1046-771 BC) and Eastern Zhou 東周|东周 (770-221 BC)
Zhou dynasty (1046-221 BC)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
King Wu of Zhou (-1043), personal name Ji Fa 姬發|姬发, reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty 1046-1043 BC
Xia dynasty, unconfirmed but placed at c. 2070-c. 1600 BC
the prehistoric Shang dynasty (c. 16th-11th century BC)
Xia Dynasty (2070-1600 BC)
Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
King Wu of Zhou 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrows tyrant Zhou of Shang 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2]
the Warring States period (475-221 BC)
vassal state
